resources.string: Confer , O Lord on us , who serve beneath the standard of Mary , that fullness of faith in you and trust in her To which is given to conquer the world. Grant us a lively faith, animated by charity, which will enable us to perform perform our actions from the motive of pure love of you.

And ever to see you and serve you in our neighbour, a faith firm and immovable as a rock , through which we shall rest tranquil and steadyfast Amid the crosses , toils and disappointments of life , a courageous faith which will inspire us to undertake and carryout without hesitation great things for your glory and for the salvation of souls.

A faith which will be our legion`s pillar of fire to lead us forth united , To kindle everywhere the fires of divine love To englighten those who are in darkness and in the shadow of death , to inflame those who are lukewarm , TO bring back to thse dead in sin And which will guide our own fit in the way of peace so that the battle of life is over.
Our legion ma reassemble, without the loss of anyone , in the kingdom of your love and glory. Amen
May the souls of our departed legionaries and the souls of all the faithful departed through the mercy of God rest in peace. Amen In the name of the father etc ....
Prayer for the beautification of the servant of God Frank Duff
God Our father, You inspired your servant Frank Duff with a profound insight into te mystery of your church the Body of Christ and in the place of Mary the mother of Christ

In his immense desire to share this insight with others and in filial dependence on Mary he formed the legion to be a sign of her maternal love for the world and means of enlisting all her children in the church`s evangelising work.

We thank you father for the grace conferred on him and for the benefits occruing to the church from his courageous and shining faith. With confidence we beg that you grant the petition we lay before you .......
We ask too that if it be in accordance with your will , the holiness of his life my be acknowledged by the church for the glory of your name
